name: T - Noelle
_source: speak;Noelle; Whoa, easy, girl!{w} This is our ally!
speak;Emma; Good heavens, I thought that I was about to become an afternoon snack.{w} I guess your wyvern isn't adjusted to me yet, Noelle?
speak;Noelle; Yeah, unfortunately she isn't good with strangers, but she is the best girl though.{w} Did you have something you wanted to discuss?
speak;Emma; I want to get to know you better,{w} since we're going to be allies and all.{w} I heard that you were the captain of your wyvern brigade.
speak;Noelle; Hah, that's right, I was!
speak;Noelle; Dad used to be a captain of his own brigade, so I wanted to followin his footsteps.{w} Even if, you know, I'm still the only member{tgm}...
speak;Emma; It's still nice that you wanted to continue his legacy in a way.{w} Layla is your younger sister, right?

speak;Noelle; Oh, Layla? She's a whole 6 years younger than me.{w} We used to be close until she got into her research of the dark arts.{w} Every time I try to get close now,{w} she just pushes me away, so I try to leave her alone.
speak;Emma; I wish I could help you guys mend your relationship{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Um, Noelle{tgm}...{tgm}your wyvern is still growling at me.
speak;Noelle; C'mon, girl, let's go for a walk!{w} I'll talk to you at dinner, Emma!
speak;Emma; I'd best leave them alone unless I want to end up wyvern food.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
